post.body: wow, Georgia eh? so no Xbox Live for a while
i guess not, i feel your pain
yea, i will watch the original on netflix streaming. definitely gonna avoid the new one. thanks for the review :)
good job, was fun :)
i hear you on the show now, im in the chatroom ;)
who emailed you??
that Ayds commenrcial was played on Howard Stern before. hilarious
Topic for the show: How are you guys adjusting from being a journalist to mkaing games?
wooo, Dan becomes a Man! cant wait to see what you guys came up with ;)
Dude, you getting L4D? Can I add ya to my friends list?
if you didn't like one whole season, i doubt the second season would change your mind.
whoa, Don Hahn, awesome!
Was fun Garnett, make sure to look for me in the chat tomorrow ;)
HAHA, you're so happy beating up Shane in SCIV
that's a tough one, hehe
we all love Big Fun :D
got it Dave, i'm int he chat right now ;)
YOU SUCK DAVE! Beetlejuice is a fun movie. i agree with @devindra that maybe you would've liked it if you saw it as a kid.
whoa, i hope Spirit is good.
whoa, viruses? die~!
nope, it's been quite warm and wet. welcome back :)
fuck the Cowboys, come join the Pats party :D
Robo-Heath Ledger? Hell yes!
did you try reinstalling iTunes and see if that helps? i don't have that problem and i use a PC.
i think Bale automatically makes any movie good.
Feel better soon!
you need to check out Kung Fu Panda on Blu-ray. PQ is outstanding as well.
Wall-E on Blu-ray is freakin amazing. The bonus features are top notch as well.
you just reminded me of the Dan Becomes A Man segment in London, lol
sounds like a fun Xmas dinner ;)
wear a Swastika t-shirt for the Valkyrie review on TRS. the forums will go nuts. :P
hates sleeping early cuz waking up around 1AM sucks!
finished Prince of Persia. Beautiful game but I have mixed feelings about the ending.
is watching the live 1Up KZ2 show. Other than the annoying lag, it's a good show.
watched a few episodes of BBC's The Human Face and it's really interesting. I already knew most of the info they presented tho.
is catching up on History of Howard Stern. Good stuff.
just came back from my family holiday party. it was fun even though not a lot of people were there.
Disc 3 of Lost Odyssey done! Man, I love this game~ I'll play Disc 4 later. I got a family holiday party to go to later today.
is continuing Lost Odyssey. I'm currently on Disc 3 and it's been epic! More JRPG fans should be playing this game. It's great.
just finished watching Layer Cake with my family. Pretty cool movie.
